metadata.title: CVE-2024-25126 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Rack is a modular Ruby web server interface. Carefully crafted content typeheaders can cause Rackâ€™s media type parser to take much longer thanexpected, leading to a possible denial of service vulnerability (ReDos 2nddegree polynomial). This vulnerability is patched in 3.0.9.1 and 2.2.8.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
